message.name: ERR_USER_XRV_DUPLICATE_RECORD
message.locale: The User Name entered has already been assigned to another User. Please enter a different name.

message.name: INF_ALREADY_ENABLED
message.locale: This users account is already enabled.

message.name: INF_ALREADY_DISABLED
message.locale: This users account has already been disabled.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_USERNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A user must have a username. Please enter a valid username.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_FULLNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: User name cannot be empty. Please enter first name and surname.

message.name: ERR_USER_XFV_EXPIRY_DATE
message.locale: The account expiry date must be later than today. Please enter a later date.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_ROLENAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A user must have a role. Please select a valid role.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_PASSWORD_EMPTY
message.locale: The Password field cannot be empty. Please enter a password.

message.name: ERR_USER_XFV_PASSWORD_ERROR
message.locale: The Password field and the Confirm Password field contain different values.

message.name: ERR_USER_LOGINRESTRICTIONS_MISSING
message.locale: When Set Access Periods is checked, at least one Access Period must be entered.

message.name: ERR_USER_LOGINRESTRICTIONS_EMPTY
message.locale: When an Access Period has been entered, Set Access Periods must be checked.

message.name: ERR_USER_LOGINTIMETO_EMPTY
message.locale: When Set Access Periods is checked, Login Time To must be entered.

message.name: ERR_USER_LOGINTIME
message.locale: Login Time From must be before Login Time To.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_APPLICATION_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter an application code.

message.name: ERR_USER_PASSWORD_NOT_CHANGED
message.locale: Your new password cannot be the same as your current password.

message.name: ERR_USER_INVALID_PASSWORD
message.locale: The password you have entered is incorrect, please try again.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_SENSITIVITY_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a sensitivity value.

message.name: ERR_USER_XRV_CONCERNROLE_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: This user cannot have a greater sensitivity value than you.

message.name: ERR_PASSWORDEXPIRESLOGINS_FV_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The number of logins after which the password expires cannot be negative.
